javax.servlet.http

接口 WebConnection

  • 所有超级接口:
    AutoCloseable

    public interface WebConnection
extends AutoCloseable
    The interface used by a HttpUpgradeHandler to interact with an upgraded HTTP connection.
    从以下版本开始:
    Servlet 3.1

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      ServletInputStream getInputStream()
      Provides access to the ServletInputStream for reading data from the client.
      ServletOutputStream getOutputStream()
      Provides access to the ServletOutputStream for writing data to the client.

      • 从接口继承的方法 java.lang.AutoCloseable

        close

    • 方法详细资料

      • getInputStream

        ServletInputStream getInputStream()
                           throws IOException
        Provides access to the ServletInputStream for reading data from the client.
        返回:
        the input stream
        抛出:
        IOException - If an I/O occurs while obtaining the stream

      • getOutputStream

        ServletOutputStream getOutputStream()
                             throws IOException
        Provides access to the ServletOutputStream for writing data to the client.
        返回:
        the output stream
        抛出:
        IOException - If an I/O occurs while obtaining the stream
